item.description:
Party Express goes to Mohegan Sun
$25 round trip gets you two ten dollars bets, discount ticket for buffet, as well as other incentives. Tickets are purchased on the bus.
Web site - www.mohegansun.com
Your on your own for shopping, gambling, and going to clubs. The bus will be making three stops. Please be on time and indicate which one you will be on so I can look for you. It is a Dacco bus.
Milford - Kimberly Diner 496 Boston Post Road, 9:10am gets back 5:30pm.
East Haven - Village Inn Restaurant East Haven Plaza, 9:35am gets back 5:20pm.
Branford - Branford Getty Station Cherry Hill Commuter Lot, 9:40am gets back 5:15pm.
We will be told what time the bus will take us back and where before going in the casino.
For lunch, we can discuss on the bus if people would like to meet for that. I will verify meeting times a few days before. If any changes, I'll send out an update.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be by the bus door holding a Meetup sign

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Bus Trip to Mohegan Sun Casino
